pkgmetadata.longdescription: LIC for Distributed Elliptical Model // This comprehensive toolkit for Distributed Elliptical model is designated as "ELIC" (The LIC for Distributed Elliptical Model Analysis) analysis. It is predicated on the assumption that the error term adheres to a Elliptical distribution. The philosophy of the package is described in Guo G. (2020) doi:10.1080/02664763.2022.2053949.
